SELECT RNUM,SEQ FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, SEQ FROM(SELECT SEQ FROM EAT_RESTAURANT WHERE (RS_NAME || RS_ADDRESS1 || RS_ADDRESS2 || RS_MENU || RS_KEYWORD) LIKE '%'||#{s_keyword}||'%' UNION SELECT RS_SEQ AS SEQ FROM RESTAURANT_REVIEW WHERE RS_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{s_keyword}||'%')) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ${start} AND ${end}

SELECT NVL(COUNT(SEQ), 0) AS CNT FROM( SELECT SEQ FROM EAT_RESTAURANT WHERE 1=1
AND (RS_NAME || RS_ADDRESS1 || RS_ADDRESS2 || RS_MENU || RS_KEYWORD) LIKE '%'||#{s_keyword}||'%'
UNION SELECT RS_SEQ AS SEQ FROM RESTAURANT_REVIEW WHERE 1=1
AND RS_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{s_keyword}||'%')

SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) AS CNT FROM EAT_RESTAURANT WHERE 1=1
AND RS_CATEGORY LIKE '%'||#{s_category}||'%'
